name: places/ChIJwQNGsoRZwokRc0G82lRm6fE
formattedAddress: 100 W 67th St #2ne, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 100 W 67th St #2ne, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text:
I highly recommend Dr. Mongno to anyone who is looking for a therapist. He is an incredibly compassionate therapist who had a significant positive impact on my life, my marriage, and my general wellbeing.

I have been seeing Dr. Mongno for more than 3 years, and I can honestly say that it has been one of the best decisions I have ever made.  I was experiencing a high level of anxiety that was affecting my work and my relationships with my wife, friends, and family.  Through my work with Dr. Mongno, I learned to better understand and manage my emotions.  Dr. Mongno is kind, patient, and understanding and made it very comfortable for me to share and speak with him.

Thank you Dr. Mongno for everything that you have done for us, we are forever grateful!
